question: <image 1> Select the type of the interval.
description: The image shows a musical staff with a treble clef at the beginning. On the staff, there are two notes: one on the second line from the top and another on the fourth line from the top. The note on the second line has a flat (♭) symbol next to it, indicating that it is a flat note. The note on the fourth line has a natural (♮) symbol next to it, indicating that it is a natural note. The distance between these two notes represents an interval.
